accueil.para1: Today, the teeshirt is an essential garment in everyone's wardrobe. And in an era where environmental issues are more pressing than ever, we prefer teeshirts made in Quebec to reduce environmental impact and highlight local craftsmanship.
accueil.para2: V-neck teeshirt, round neck, loose or fitted, short sleeves or long sleeves for the chilly ones, plain or patterned to style an outfit... The teeshirt is available in a variety of colors, styles, and patterns.

teeshirts.metaTitre: teeTIM // comfortable teeshirts, made in Quebec, of superior quality
